message: Line number discrepancy in deployment_modifier agent report: Reported lines 1384-1433 are INCORRECT. Actual deployment modifications are at lines 1620-1668 (50 lines). Lines 1384-1433 are part of create_real_task function. This documentation error could confuse future maintenance.

data.impact: Documentation inaccuracy - could mislead future developers
data.severity_justification: Non-blocking but significant - affects documentation accuracy
data.verification_method: Direct code reading at lines 1384-1433 vs 1620-1668
